means: 大力神的，力大无比的，费力的

sentence.Network_en: Truly none was so fit to set about this herculean labour as Petruchio.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样困难的事除了彼特鲁乔以外确实找不到更合适的人来办了.

sentence.Network_en: The consortium began its Herculean task by looking at supply chain processes.
sentence.Network_cn: 该联盟从研究供应链的过程入手开始这个艰巨的任务.

sentence.Network_en: Bringing the body of Christ together in Chicago is a Herculean task.
sentence.Network_cn: 在芝加哥,将基督的身体合为一体是一项艰巨的任务.

list.abs: The Big Bang Theory 生活大爆炸第二季... ... promise: 承诺 Herculean task: 艰巨的任务 Herculean: 困难的.
... Achilles' heel 阿喀琉斯的脚踵 Herculean task 赫拉克勒斯的任务（指非常艰巨的任务） land on one's feet 脱离困境，摆脱困难.
despite our remarkable progress , the chinese banking sector still confronts herculean tasks .尽管我们取得了明显进步，但中国银行业仍面临极为艰巨的任务。

entry.def: A herculean task or ability is one that requires extremely great strength or effort.

example.ex: ...his herculean efforts to bring peace to our troubled island.
example.tran: 他为给我们这个纷争不断的岛屿带来和平所作出的艰苦努力

auth_sentence.content: Some collaborations have required herculean efforts behind the scenes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some collaborations have required herculean efforts behind the scenes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some collaborations have required herculean efforts behind the scenes.

auth_sentence.content: We...made a Herculean effort...to put in all the new moves and dialogue.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: We...made a Herculean effort...to put in all the new moves and dialogue.

auth_sentence.content: This would be a Herculean, global effort to change the calendar.
auth_sentence.res_content: This would be a Herculean, global effort to change the calendar.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This would be a Herculean, global effort to change the calendar.

means.word_mean: 力大无比的;骁勇无比的
